mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(me_id, me_ms_state, me_ma_auth, me_pw, me_nickname, me_name, me_phone, me_address, me_type) VALUE(#{member.me_id}, "이용중", "일반", #{member.me_pw}, #{member.me_nickname}, #{member.me_name}, #{member.me_phone}, #{member.me_address}, 0)
mapper.update: update member set me_interests = #{member.me_interests}, me_preferloc = #{member.me_preferloc}, me_prefertime = #{member.me_prefertime}, me_onoff = #{member.me_onoff}, me_intro = #{member.me_intro} where me_id = #{me_id}
mapper.select: select me_id from member where me_name = #{me_name} and me_phone = #{me_phone}
select * from member where me_id = #{me_id} and me_phone = #{me_phone}
select * from member where me_cookie = #{session_id} and me_cookie_limit >= now()
